exclamation_reserved:
! is reserved.

Use it to end multi-item mode (after Lows / S).
reserved_word:
That word is reserved for a command.

Use the full command (e.g. Need Milk 10, Low Milk).
reply_yes_no_new_item: Reply yes or no to add the new item.
multi_mode_ended_empty: Multi-item mode ended. No items added.
item_not_in_list_multi:
âŒ {item_name} is not in the list.

Add it first with 'Low {item_name}' in single mode.
added_part_send_more:
ğŸ“ Added {part}

Send more or ! to finish.
send_existing_or_finish:
Send an existing item (e.g. Milk 2)
or ! to finish.
multi_mode_start:
ğŸ“‹ Multi-item mode

Send existing items only (e.g. Milk 2).

help_low_detail:
Low / L â€“ Add item (sets current inventory quantity)

Usage:
â€¢ Low Milk or L Milk â€“ add 1 to current inventory
â€¢ Low Almond 2 â€“ add 2 to current inventory
â€¢ Milk 3 â€“ same as Low (default)
â€¢ Beans â€“ add 1 Beans

Sets the quantity of the current inventory for that item. New items: bot asks type first (1=Raw, 2=Prep). Prep uses default prep supplier; Raw asks for supplier.
help_sup_detail:
Sup â€“ List suppliers

Usage:
â€¢ Sup â€“ show numbered list
â€¢ Reply with number â€“ see details + order + WhatsApp link
help_supa_detail:
Supa â€“ Add supplier

Usage:
â€¢ Supa â€“ bot asks: company name, contact name, phone number
help_list_detail:
List â€“ List items

Usage:
â€¢ List â€“ show all items grouped by supplier
â€¢ List <pattern> â€“ filter by supplier name (regex)
help_listext_detail:
ListExt / Ext â€“ Extended list

Usage:
â€¢ ListExt or Ext â€“ show items with last report date and user who updated
â€¢ ListExt <pattern> â€“ filter by supplier name
help_need_detail:
Need / N â€“ Set required quantity

Usage:
â€¢ Need Milk 10 â€“ set Milk required to 10
â€¢ N Beans 5 â€“ same

Order qty = required âˆ’ quantity (shown in supplier details).
help_need_fill_detail:
Need <supplier regex> â€“ Easy fill by supplier

Usage:
â€¢ Need Edward â€“ show items from suppliers matching 'Edward'
â€¢ For each item: reply with required quantity (or empty for 0)
â€¢ Back / ! â€“ cancel
help_help_detail:
Help / H â€“ Show commands

Usage:
â€¢ Help or H â€“ list all commands
â€¢ Help Low â€“ detailed help for Low
â€¢ Help <command> â€“ detailed help for any command
help_lows_detail:
Lows / S â€“ Multi-item mode

Usage:
â€¢ Lows / S â€“ start mode
â€¢ Lows Milk / S Milk â€“ start and add Milk
â€¢ Milk 2 â€“ add another (existing items only)
â€¢ ! â€“ finish and save
help_lows_fill_detail:
Lows <supplier regex> â€“ Easy fill by supplier

Usage:
â€¢ Lows Edward â€“ show items from suppliers matching 'Edward'
â€¢ For each item: reply with quantity (or empty for 0)
â€¢ Back / ! â€“ cancel
help_lang_detail:
Language (in Pref)

Usage:
â€¢ Pref or P â†’ 1 â€“ change language
help_pref_detail:
Pref / P â€“ Settings

Usage:
â€¢ Pref or P â€“ open menu
  1. Language
  2. Default prep supplier (assigns to all Prep items)
help_back_detail:
Back / B / Exit / Quit / Cancel â€“ Go back one step

Usage:
â€¢ Back / Cancel / Exit / Quit â€“ go back in add supplier, new item, supplier selection, type selection, etc.

edit_item_not_found: âŒ {item_name} is not in the list. Add it first with Low.
edit_no_suppliers: No suppliers yet. Add one with Supa.
edit_prep_to_raw_select_supplier: Select supplier for Raw (not prep supplier):
edit_prep_to_raw_no_other_supplier: No other suppliers. Add one with Supa before changing Prep to Raw.
edit_rename_exists: âŒ {new_name} already exists. Choose another name.

â€¢ 1. Change supplier
